paragraphs.body: On Avatar Wiki, bots can, after approval, run tasks to help keep the wiki clean.
paragraphs.text: On Avatar Wiki, bots can, after approval, run tasks to help keep the wiki clean.

paragraphs.body: This page is designed to serve as a noticeboard for all currently running tasks, and as a page for users to request new tasks to be run. All bot requests must be posted here. Likewise, tasks should be noted here before being run.
paragraphs.text: This page is designed to serve as a noticeboard for all currently running tasks, and as a page for users to request new tasks to be run. All bot requests must be posted here. Likewise, tasks should be noted here before being run.

paragraphs.body: Currently, only one bot routinely runs tasks on Avatar Wiki. This is The 888th Bot, a bot run by The 888th Avatar. Bot task requests on this page will be assumed to be for The 888th Bot, unless otherwise stated.
paragraphs.text: Currently, only one bot routinely runs tasks on Avatar Wiki. This is The 888th Bot, a bot run by The 888th Avatar. Bot task requests on this page will be assumed to be for The 888th Bot, unless otherwise stated.

paragraphs.body: Mr. Joeyaa should begin playing the deprecated and common fixing game soon once his owner gets a few nice looking regexes. Joey aa 10:25, 19 August 2009 (UTC)
